main event: A blue white object resembling a meteor was observed in Rialto, California on October 22, 1955.
interesting points: The observation lasted for only 3 seconds,The object produced a bright flash of light during the sighting,The sighting was classified as a possible balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object,The sighting was conducted using ground radar,No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: a blue white object that looked like a meteor
